org.jboss.aerogear.android.authorization.oauth2

Class OAuth2AuthzModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jboss.aerogear.android.authorization.oauth2.OAuth2AuthzModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthzModule, org.jboss.aerogear.android.pipe.module.PipeModule
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OAuth2IntentAuthzModule, OAuth2WebViewAuthzModule

    public abstract class OAuth2AuthzModule
extends Object
implements AuthzModule
    An Authorization module which works with the OAuth2 protocol. Authorization is performed in a WebView and returned to the calling activity.

    • Method Detail

      • isAuthorized

        public final boolean isAuthorized()
        Description copied from interface: AuthzModule
        If a module is Authorized that means that it can be used to provide authorization meta-data to calling code.
        Specified by:
        isAuthorized in interface AuthzModule
        Returns:
        if the module is in a state that allows it to be used.

      • hasCredentials

        public final boolean hasCredentials()
        Description copied from interface: AuthzModule
        This function checks if a module has all of the necessary information to make a authorized request. This method does not check the state of those tokens. For that you should use AuthzModule.isAuthorized()
        Specified by:
        hasCredentials in interface AuthzModule
        Returns:
        if the module has completed Authorization.

      • requestAccess

        public abstract void requestAccess(android.app.Activity activity,
                                   org.jboss.aerogear.android.core.Callback<String> callback)
        Description copied from interface: AuthzModule
        Begin requesting access for the application. This method MUST be asynchronous. An implementation MAY start a new activity, but the calling Activity MUST handle the response itself.
        Specified by:
        requestAccess in interface AuthzModule
        Parameters:
        activity - the calling activity.
        callback - a callback to be called upon completion of the authorization action.

      • getAuthorizationFields

        public final org.jboss.aerogear.android.pipe.module.AuthorizationFields getAuthorizationFields(URI requestUri,
                                                                                               String method,
                                                                                               byte[] requestBody)
        Description copied from interface: AuthzModule
        This method is called be Pipe implementations when they need security applied to their HttpProvider. The headers/data/query parameters returned should be applied to the Url and HttpProvider directly before a call.
        Specified by:
        getAuthorizationFields in interface AuthzModule
        Parameters:
        requestUri - the Request-Line URI.
        method - the HTTP method being used
        requestBody - the body of the request. This method promises to not modify the body.
        Returns:
        the current AuthorizationFields for security

      • refreshAccess

        public final boolean refreshAccess()
        Description copied from interface: AuthzModule
        Refreshing access will synchronously check the current of the tokens and refresh them if necessary. This is used by AeroGear if tokens expired while a reference to the module is still held by a pipe.
        Specified by:
        refreshAccess in interface AuthzModule
        Returns:
        true if access to the system is in a good state.

      • hasAccount

        protected boolean hasAccount()
        Returns:
        true if accountId has a value AND that value is stored in the OAuth2AuthzService
